name: fleet-monitor-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK TypeScript Infrastructure for Fleet Monitor Platform

scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy FleetMonitorDev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && cdk deploy FleetMonitorStaging --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy FleetMonitorProd --require-approval never
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib/*.js lib/*.d.ts bin/*.js bin/*.d.ts cdk.out node_modules
